metadata.title: CVE-2024-36029 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mmc:sdhci-msm: pervent access to suspended controller Generic sdhci coderegisters LED device and uses host->runtime_suspended flag to protectaccess to it. The sdhci-msm driver doesn't set this flag, which causes acrash when LED is accessed while controller is runtime suspended. Fix thisby setting the flag correctly.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
